snippet.title: Amiga Longplay [220] Myth
snippet.description:
Decided to record this text adventure as it has the same name as my previous Amiga longplay. Well, the other longplay's title is "Myth: History in the Making", a bit longer, but still.

Myth is set in a world of ancient Greek gods, whose existence is threatened by the rise of Christianity. To keep up humanity's faith in the gods, Zeus, the god-in-chief, decides to set them all on heroic tasks, just like the good old days. Naturally, you are first: you are Poseidon, the god of the sea (though, incidentally, you cannot swim!), tasked with recovering the Dark Helmet of Hades.

Could only have 2 keys onboard at the same time, which is why I do what I do, but I think I typed something in the game to explain it a bit.

Need to win 600 obols to progress in the game.

Goofed around a bit, sorry if it's annoying :)
